backend/main.mo: Defines core types and state for products, orders, translations, agents, and includes authorization mixin for the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Provides feature evidence metadata linking features to affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short textual summaries for many frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and dark mode CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, app layout, i18n provider, and all admin/agent-protected routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAuthC: Renders admin login/logout button with state from useAdminSession and i18n labels.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Modal component for admin login handling username/password input and session actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and showing an access denied UI with login modal if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/agent/AgentLogin: Login modal handling agent authentication with Internet Identity and credential checks, including error display and logout.
frontend/src/components/agent/AgentRoute: Route guard that blocks access for unauthenticated agents and shows a login prompt modal.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSel: Initial language selection modal shown once, allowing users to pick a preferred language.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Dropdown allowing users to switch the current app language.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout providing header, navigation, language switcher, footer, and admin/agent login modals.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderNowD: Dialog offering website checkout or WhatsApp ordering options for a product.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Image gallery with navigation arrows and thumbnails for browsing multiple product images.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Generic error display component with optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/LoadingSt: Simple loading indicator showing a spinner and optional message.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Defines allowed product categories and helper functions for labels and translation keys.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Centralized contact details including phone, WhatsApp, address, and Google Maps links.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAgents.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on agents using the admin actor and session token.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useReferenceWeb: Fetches and updates reference website data with public and admin actors.
Manages admin login/logout with localStorage-backed session state and hardcoded credentials.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useAdminStatus.t: Exposes admin authentication status and token based on useAdminSession.
Handles agent login/logout using actor methods, localStorage, and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useUserProfile.t: Retrieves and saves the authenticated user's profile via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useAgentOrders: Fetches orders assigned to the authenticated agent.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useCreateOrder: Creates a new customer order and refreshes order lists with notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Loads customer orders by status or all orders for admins using admin actor and token.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useUpdateOrder: Updates order status as an admin and refreshes cached order data.
frontend/src/hooks/products/useProductMu: Provides admin mutations for creating, updating, and deleting products with cache invalidation.
Fetches products with language-aware transformations and category filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/translations/useAbout: Loads and updates multilingual About Us content using public and admin actors.
frontend/src/hooks/translations/useLandi: Gets and updates landing page translations based on language and admin access.
frontend/src/hooks/translations/useProdu: Updates per-language product name and description fields via the admin actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Creates an anonymous backend actor for admin-related operations using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Defines supported languages, default language, and translation dictionaries for UI strings.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context provider handling current language, persistence, and translation lookup.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAgentsPage: Admin interface to create, edit, and delete agents with form validation and dialog-based CRUD actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard linking to management sections and displaying reference website info.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditImages: Static admin page explaining that image management is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditTextPa: Provides UI for editing hero, about, and product translation text across languages, using tabs and translation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGalleryPag: Displays gallery section placeholder with notice that image management will be added later.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OrderManagement: Shows all orders with filters by product type and lets admins view and update order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PlannedFeatures: Lists planned Phase 2 features with descriptions and shows completed Phase 1 features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ProductManagerP: Admin interface to add, edit, and delete products with translations, categories, pricing, and stock management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReferenceWebsit: Allows saving and editing a reference website URL and notes, with view and open-link functionality.
frontend/src/pages/agent/AgentOrdersPage: Displays a table of agent orders with loading/error states, using hooks to fetch orders and showing details like customer info, product, amount, and status.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Displays a checkout form with validation, product info loading, and order creation logic.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact details, phone and address cards, and an embedded map with fallback handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero text, features, category navigation, and WhatsApp contact actions with translation fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info including images, price, stock, and allows ordering or WhatsApp enquiries.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListPage.tsx: Lists products with category filtering, loading/error states, and product preview cards.
frontend/src/utils/productType.ts: Provides helpers to map product type enums and category strings to humanâ€‘readable labels and enum values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains simple form validation helpers for required fields, mobile numbers, pincodes, quantities, prices, and stock values.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp chat URLs and opens chats with a predefined message using the configured contact number.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, typography, and container settings, with plugins enabled for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project scope, issues, design constraints, and feature requirements for ongoing development and fixes.
